Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a game board for the Pacman game. The board contains all the walls and characters needed to play the came
    Version:
    May 28, 2020
    Author:
    Sanjana Neeli, Shamita Gurusu, Cheryl Lin, Period: 2, Assignment: Final Project, Sources: none

    • Constructor Summary

      constructor for the Board.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createLevelFour()
      adds all walls, ghosts, pacman, and pellets needed for level four and shows the board
      void createLevelOne()
      adds all walls, ghosts, pacman, and pellets needed for level one and shows the board
      void createLevelThree()
      adds all walls, ghosts, pacman, and pellets needed for level three and shows the board
      void createLevelTwo()
      adds all walls, ghosts, pacman, and pellets needed for level two and shows the board
      void createLongWall(info.gridworld.grid.Location l1, info.gridworld.grid.Location l2)
      creates a vertical or horizontal line of wall
      void fillWithSmallPellet()
      fills all remaining empty spaces in board with small pellets
      void organize()
      creates the appropriate level of board indicated in the constructor
      void reset()
      resets the entire board, clearing all Actors from the board leaving a blank slate.
      void resetLevel()
      resets the entire board, clearing all Actors from the board leaving a blank slate.

        creates the appropriate level of board indicated in the constructor

      • reset

        public void reset()
        resets the entire board, clearing all Actors from the board leaving a blank slate. all character's global variables are set to null

      • resetLevel

        public void resetLevel()
        resets the entire board, clearing all Actors from the board leaving a blank slate.
